Name: Alchemist of War
About the game: War! What is it good for? Absolutely nothing! Unless, of course, you're a weapon's merchant. Alchemist of War is a casual card game with crafting elements. Play as the Alchemist Merchant. Craft weapons using random ingredients. Your customers are from both sides of a war. But you don't have any favorites! As long as they keep paying. And if the fight goes on longer, maybe you can sell more. Featuring: 15 different weapons 15 crafting ingredient cards 11 unique customers Try to reach a higher score by balancing the power between the warring factions. Hey, They're gonna fight anyway, right?... Right??
